name: INVERTO (itch)
description:
Click on "PLAY NOW" to start the game.

Use SHIFT or C to ATTACK, ARROWS and WASD for directions but don't be surprised by the alternation of the directions as this is part of the game logic.

The goal is to shift all the RED swords in GREEN swords.

This is a submission to the 2020 GMTK game jam, with the theme "OUT OF CONTROL"

Assets credit:  huges laborde

Sound credits:
Sound from Zapsplat.com
Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
